node.title: The Elf on the Shelf is about to arrive in homes across Australia. But what is it?
node.alt: A toy elf wearing a red hat and full bodysuit with a sparkly background
node.description: Have you heard of the Elf on the Shelf Christmas tradition?Â This modern trend, adored by families worldwide, keeps children on their best behaviour before Santa arrives.
node.content:
["Christmas time is filled with fun and festive holiday traditions, but have you heard of the Elf on the Shelf?", "This modern trend, adored by families worldwide, keeps children on their best behaviour before Santa arrives.", "But how do you get your own elf and what do they get up to when you're sleeping?", "
What is the Elf on the Shelf?\u00a0
", "The Elf on the Shelf is a scout elf.", "Their job is to stay with their adopted families from December 1 and watch the children's adventures during the holiday season.\u00a0", "", "
Many families around Australia have adopted the Christmas tradition of Elf on the Shelf.\u00a0(Instagram: scout_ourcheekyelfontheshelf)
", "Each night, they head back to the North Pole to report to Santa, and before dawn, the elves dash back home.\u00a0", "They never hide in the same place twice, and no-one must ever touch the elf, or else they will lose their magic.\u00a0", "The elves have also been known to get a little distracted at work and cause mischief themselves.", "", "
Elves Twinkletoes and Skittles are double trouble together, wrapping Lisa Azzopardi's family car completely in Christmas paper.\u00a0(Instagram: twinkletoes_and _skittles)
", "The origins of the Elf on the Shelf dates back to the 1970s when it was just a family tradition for American sisters Chanda Bell and Christa Pitts.", "\"We had an elf growing up for as long as we can remember,\" Christa Pitts said in an interview with HuffPost.", "\"Our elf was named Fisbee, and Fisbee, of course, would report to Santa Claus at night and be back in a different position in our house the next day.\"\u00a0", "In 2005, the sisters and their mother decided to share the story of the magical scout elf and self-published the book The Elf on the Shelf: A Christmas Tradition.", "Since then it has increased in popularity and is now a widespread practice.", "", "
\u00a0Audette Heath says\u00a0Scout the elf's visits keeps\u00a0\"the Christmas magic alive.\"\u00a0\n\u00a0(Instagram:\u00a0scout_ourcheekyelfontheshelf)
", "
How does Elf on the Shelf arrive?
", "Children get their first visit from the Elf on the Shelf on the morning of December 1.", "This is the third year Minty the elf will visit Tenneille Langton's family.", "\"Usually, our elf arrives via special mail delivery, but there was a lot of concern that our elf wouldn't arrive in time,\" Ms Langton said.\u00a0", "To ensure Minty arrived in time for her daughter, Ms Langton\u00a0installed an elf door to welcome them home.", "", "
Tenneille Langton's daughter has a minty treaty ready for when\u00a0her Minty the elf visits.\u00a0(supplied\u00a0)
", "Lisa Azzopardi's family are visited by elves Twinkletoes and Skittles, who help build the excitement for Christmas.\u00a0", "\"This tradition has become very special to our family,\" she said.", "\"They arrive differently each year but always deliver a December 1 box filled with Christmas goodies and an advent calendar.", "", "
Twinkletoes and Skittles love soaking up Queensland's warm\u00a0weather compared to the North Pole.\u00a0(Instagram: twinkletoes_and _skittles)
", "\"We only have one child, so it's really important to us to make Christmas as magical and special as we can for our son.\u00a0", "\"For us, it's about Christmas magic and believing and enjoying the innocence of childhood.\"", "", "
Twinkletoes and Skittles also love playing games like the floor is lava at Lisa Azzopardi's house.\u00a0(Instagram:\u00a0twinkletoes_and _skittles)
", "
What are some ideas for Elf on the Shelf?
", "Elves love causing mischief as much as they love spreading Christmas cheer.\u00a0", "Scout the elf has been visiting Audette Heath's two daughters for eight Christmases and his antics have been getting bigger every year.\u00a0", "", "
Scout tried to butter up their family with some Christmas cheer.(Instagram:\u00a0scout_ourcheekyelfontheshelf)
", "\"I honestly think Scout is their favourite part of Christmas,\" Ms Heath said.\u00a0", "\"They love waking up super early to see what he's been up to!\"\u00a0", "Scout is notorious for wrapping anything and everything in Christmas paper at Ms Heath's house, including their fridge, kitchen and living room couches.", "", "
Rosanna Kirby's oldest child loves getting involved with Elf on the Shelf.\u00a0(Instagram:\u00a0scout_ourcheekyelfontheshelf)
", "Rosanne Kirby's family has been visited by McElf the Elf for nine Christmases.\u00a0", "\"For us, watching our children light up and laugh at the elf's antics is the best Christmas present we could receive,\" she said.\u00a0", "Ms Kirby said McElf's visits help keep \"the spirit and magic of Christmas alive.\"", "\"Our three children have grown up with Elf on the Shelf from such a young age and are always excited when December 1 arrives.\"", "McElf always makes their visits at Christmas time memorable: last year they turned the dishwasher into a bubble party.", "", "
Last year, Rosanne Kirby's family adopted an Elf pet, a reindeer, to join McElf in spreading Christmas cheer(Instagram:\u00a0elfontheshelfcreativity)
"]
